title: Spear (Last Man Standing)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The spear is an item that players are given during the beginning of a game of Last Man Standing.

content:
Spear (Last Man Standing) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Spear

Item ID20397

The spear is an item that players are given during the beginning of a game of Last Man Standing.

Despite being called a spear, it is classified as a halberd, and has stats comparable to a steel halberd. Its appearance is that of a recoloured toktz-mej-tal.

 Attack bonuses
+22+18+0-4+0

14 July 2016

The item was added to Last Man Standing beta.

[[File:Spear (Last Man Standing) detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''spear''' is an item that players are given during the beginning of a game of [[Last Man Standing]].

Despite being called a spear, it is classified as a [[halberd]], and has stats comparable to a [[steel halberd]]. Its appearance is that of a recoloured [[toktz-mej-tal]].
